name: ringingly
content:
ringingly adverb
(LOUDLY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
loudly and clearly: "Victory will be ours!" she cried ringingly at the conclusion of her speech. The ringingly clear sound of the trumpet solo is always moving.
More examplesFewer examplesThe boy's haunting soprano sounded ringingly around the cathedral.The whole crowd ringingly sang the national anthem.
